item.title: march/april music
item.author: me@robxu9.com (Robert Xu)
item.description:
I got Spotify Premium this month! So everything I’ve been listening to is in my Spotify playlist.

A criticism of Spotify here - your new client sucks. It takes up double the memory, meaning I can’t run it and use my Linux VM, I can’t Ctrl-F through my playlist anymore, and your playlist has started to remove tracks on its own.

Not cool. I don’t like tracks disappearing from my playlist because they’re either local files or unplayable on this computer.

So I had to downgrade. (grumble grumble)

But yeah, here’s my Spotify playlist.
